comment: For the next Survivor series , let s get politicians and force them to live on the current minimum wage without access to their current bank account , house , car , or luxuries . They must pay rent , feed a family , clothe a family , work a minimum wage job , etc . for months .

                                          :time c))
                              :op2 (h / house)

      :snt2 (o2 / obligate-01

                  :op4 (w3 / work-01

                  :op5 (e / et-cetera)

      :snt3 o2
      :ARG1 t

            :op1 p2
            :ARG0 t
            :ARG3 r)
      :op2 w3
      :ARG0 t

      :time (s / series
